name: <mm::dma::dma_coherent::DmaCoherent as core::ops::Drop>::drop

mm::mem_obj::HasPaddrRange::paddr_range.doc: Returns the physical address range of the memory object.

mm::dma::util::unprepare_dma.doc:
Unprepares a physical address range from DMA mapping.

 # Safety

 The provided physical address range must be untyped DMA memory that was
 previously prepared by an [`alloc_unprotect_physical_range()`] call.
